structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Home inspectors prohibited from indicating compliance or noncompliance with Kentucky Residential Code.
law.text: Home inspectors, when acting in that capacity, are prohibited from indicating orally or in writing that any condition is or is not in compliance with the Kentucky Residential Code.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 13, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 20, effective July 13, 2004.
